website_summaries.verdict: This organic mouthwash whitens gum pockets, reduces tooth sensitivity, and much more.
pros: Certified organic and does not contain alcohol, glycerin, sodium lauryl sulfate, or fluoride
Delivers whiter teeth and fresher breath faster than ever before
Reduces the risk of internal diseases associated with oral bacteria getting into the bloodstream and organs
cons: Taste may be unpleasant for some users
May cause a burning sensation on the gums

website_summaries.verdict: Worth considering if you want a whitening mouthwash that is free of fluoride and alcohol - and you don't mind the higher price.
pros: Combines peroxide with essential oils for whiter teeth and fresh breath
A good choice for consumers who prefer to avoid fluoride and alcohol, as it contains neither
cons: Repeat users gripe about the formula being changed, and some say it's not as good as the previous one

customer_reviews.title: Black tongue!
customer_reviews.text: The product seemed fine--could handle the taste, etc.--but one day I noticed my tongue was BLACK! Yuck. Despite using as directed, apparently I developed "hairy black tongue." Once I quit the mouthwash my tongue went back to normal within about two weeks. Obviously the mouthwash works well for some people, so I don't want to totally hate on it, but I think they should label the bottle with some warning about this potential side effect!
customer_reviews.author: jc480

customer_reviews.title: way better than dental hygienist
customer_reviews.text: This Has reduced my gum bleeding to zero. Beats everything else we've tried, and that a bunch of stuff. Also, way better than dental hygienist.
customer_reviews.author: song sparrow's

customer_reviews.title: Reduces plaque buildup! Teeth feel so clean!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I knew about this mouth rinse sooner! I genuinely can say it leaves my teeth feeling so clean like after a cleaning from your dentist. My teeth stay cleaner much longer and the plaque build up is so much slower if I use this every time after brushing my teeth! I can tell the times when I forget to use this! I highly recommend and will definitely repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to fluoride containing toothpastes!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot wait to buy more of this brush rinse. If you are aware of the effects of fluoride exposure over time then this would be a great switch for you. My favorite benefit of this toothpaste is that it 100% has made my teeth whiter. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the way my mouth feels
customer_reviews.text: OMG My mouth never ever felt cleaner or fresher, even after a professional dental cleaning. I have always HATED mouthwash because of the taste and the stinging. Oil pulling made me gag. After only 3 days my gums are no longer swollen or bleeding and my loose tooth no longer hurts, Cant wait to see what a whole bottle can do! THANK YOU for inventing this magical stuff!
customer_reviews.author: lmartin

customer_reviews.title: Notably whiter teeth - cured my sad gums!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product!! A few years ago, my dentist told me I had great teeth but some gingivitis. I was horrified, as I take pride in my dental hygiene. To avoid chemicals in generic mouthwash, I started making my own. This one blows mine out of the water. Great taste. Love the bubbly feeling from the hydrogen peroxide. Notably whiter teeth - people have been commenting a lot recently!! My husband was super jealous and started using the mouthwash too, haha. And now my gums feel strong and super healthy again! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: treesandteas

customer_reviews.title: Beware: New Formula is very aggressive and different!
customer_reviews.text: This product has changed significantly! It is very aggressive and the taste is terrible. I have purchased this product for years, and recommended it to many, many people. I phoned to company to inquire about the new formula change over a week ago, and have not received a call back. The new formula now contains 1.5 % peroxide. The original formula contained 1%. As mentioned, the new formula is aggressive, and burns your gums, and has somewhat of a "sour taste"! I don't know why this company changed the formula that worked so well for many years!! Has anyone else noticed this difference. Please post if you have. Perhaps the company will go back to the original formula!
customer_reviews.author: Natural Doc

customer_reviews.title: Great for healthy gums!
customer_reviews.text: I use this brushing rinse with my Sonicare in lieu of toothpaste. I have very healthy teeth and gums, but when I run out of it, I do notice a difference in gum sensitivity. The new formula tastes a bit worse than its predecessor, but I shake the bottle well and deal with it because I like the product so well overall.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Friedenzohn

customer_reviews.title: It grows on you
customer_reviews.text: Day one: "this is awful. I have made a bad life decision." Day two: "this is bad. I don't want to commit to this anymore." Day five: "I have not died yet. It tastes bland but minty. But this is obviously hydrogen peroxide. With a little organic dirt for flavor" Day 14: "I hate commercial breath destinker and I hope it bankrupts itself" All in all, once you get over the "high density soda bubbie" hydrogen peroxide feel, you'll be fine. But initially? It tastes like organic dirty peroxide. You'll be fine! Just give it two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Arrowina

customer_reviews.title: Super annoyed/low safety
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouth wash and but at regularly from my local co op. I wanted to order online for safety. I opened it this morning and there is no protective seal on the inside. I can tell there was one at some point because there is a little piece of silver foil on the edge. This is NOT safe and super annoying. Will not be being purchasing again online as it looks like they do not practice proper safety.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Diluted???
customer_reviews.text: I’m sorry but just because your product is in high demand because it supposedly kills covid doesn’t mean you cut corners! I’ve purchased pre and post hype and I can say without a doubt that my latest purchase, amidst covid, is mostly cinnamon flavored even though it’s supposed to be primarily peppermint flavored. I don’t get the bubbly peroxide clean feel after rinsing. I loved this product so much and am really really bummed on the lack of integrity for a previously great product. I like to think that people are better than that so just maybe I got a bad batch but it’s quite coincidental to me.
customer_reviews.author: courtney b

customer_reviews.title: Tastes anything but organic
customer_reviews.text: While all of the ingredients in this are organic, the hydrogen peroxide counteracts these benefits and makes this wash feel very unnatural and taste like chemicals and leave a harsh sensation on teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be improved
customer_reviews.text: I tried to get past having to hold a tissue over the top when you shake it (because it leaks slightly and splatters). But it basically seemed like just hydrogen peroxide and water in a renamed bottle for 4 times as much money. Definitely Not enough mint oil or any other ingredients that I could notice much of. I used it, and did seem to rinse the bacteria away, but that’s just the hydrogen peroxide. This product needs a much better balance of ingredients and a bottle that doesn’t leak.
customer_reviews.author: Ella Davis

customer_reviews.title: Ohhhh, you rinse your mouth FIRST!
customer_reviews.text: I have the ultimate stank breath. Tried a lot of products and some of them work. I decided to give this one a try. My first full day of the mouthwash and I'm for real, it works. It says peppermint, but you don't taste anything strong and minty about it. I tasted of nothing. You rinse your mouth first. It fizzes and kills the gunk in your mouth. I brushed afterward and scraped my tongue as I usually do. All day, my breath and mouth have been tolerable! I'm very, very pleased with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: We are joying using the brush rinse. It’s been about a month of daily use. I do notice that my breath stays fresh and my teeth are somewhat whiter, but my main reason for buying it is about healthy gum care. I plan to continue using it - at least for a while so my dentist can evaluate if it has helped my gums become healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Can tell a difference already!!!! Love that it has natural ingredients🤓
customer_reviews.text: I just received this in the mail on yesterday and had to immediate write a review. I didn't expect this stuff to work so quickly. Following the directions exactly and my teeth and mouth feel cleaner. I can't say whether my teeth are whiter but I do feel a difference immediately. I will give it some more time and update my review but for now I'm very very pleased. Thanks to all the wonderful reviews I may have stumbled upon something that actually works.. Excited about a healthy smile!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Best mouthwash by far!
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten away from all the cancer causing chemicals in personal care products and moving to natural products. This is easily the best mouthwash I have ever used! Tastes great, no nasty after mouth feeling, and all the ingredients are safe and organic! If there's a better product then this on the market I'd like to see it. Some may complain about the price but would you rather spend a few bucks more now in life or spend all your time and money in the hospital later in life because the chemicals we expose ourselves to. Easy choice for me
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: tonsil stones, gone! white teeth instantly!
customer_reviews.text: Only used a couple times so far, taste horrible, but seems to work great!!! No bad breath and my teeth are super white after just a couple uses! I struggle with tonsil stones, anyone who does have them knows how gross they are and how impossible they are to get rid of. I haven't had them since the day I started using this, I will deff. continue to use this product as long as they stay away!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Wish I'd realized what this actually is before I purchased.
customer_reviews.text: Basically, you could make this yourself with purified water and hydrogen peroxide. Then add a few drops of some essential oils. And some aloe. I have all these things and could have made it myself and saved the cash. I do not care for the hydrogen peroxide sensation or taste, though. Wished I'd realized before purchasing that this was mostly hydrogen peroxide. Yucky. Not a refreshing natural mouthwash which I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Savitri

customer_reviews.title: Feels like I stepped out of the dentist office...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. I have been using it for several weeks now and after about the first day or two my teeth felt as clean as if I had walked out of the dentist office. I have noticeably less plaque and it has stopped my gums from bleeding. My routine now uses an electric tooth brush and the Auromere herbal toothpaste. Wow, just an amazing experience. I really enjoy brushing my teeth now and look forward to it. I also think this rinse helps reduce the bacteria in your toothbrush so your toothbrush lasts longer and doesn't get gunked up. I just ordered my second bottle to stock up. I plan on using this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hood

customer_reviews.title: I like this mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I like this mouthwash, though it was a bit odd at first as it gets a bit foamy. It leaves my mouth feeling clean. The flavor could be a bit more minty. Overall I would recommend this product for good mouth hygiene.
customer_reviews.author: rlh

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Originally ordered and received product badly damaged. Amazon was kind enough to send me free replacement and this time it arrived perfectly. To comment on product; I have used this product for several months. It’s great at whitening teeth, freshens breath, and even got rid of my tooth pain immediately due to the clove in it. I came across this product as a happy accident. Will continue to use and was pleased to get it cheap on amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Necessary, as far as I'm concerned.
customer_reviews.text: This pre-brush rinse is wonderful for optimal mouth health and dental hygiene! After using this, I floss, rinse with this again, and then use Uncle Harry's tooth powder on my WaterPik brand electric toothbrush. My dentist is amazed at how clean my teeth are, plus, they are nice and white :)
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Cerise

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Took a week or so for me to get used to the taste (family members, less, or had no issues from get go), but really freshens. Following their instruction to use first thing in the morning, I find this to be really effective that keeps breath fresh throughout the day, and my family has adopted this new routine. Makes sense to wash out all the bacteria out first thing before even drinking the first glass of water... wish we knew of this product and routine sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Calimari

customer_reviews.title: Not Returnable!
customer_reviews.text: Dislike this product! Makes our mouths feel dry. And doesn’t seem to clean teeth well either! Can’t return! Wish I would have noticed that before ordering!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Quan

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars. Burnt my gums. Changed formula or omitted toxic ingredients!! 😤
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brushing rinse in a smaller size years ago (like 2016) and it was fine. I buy the bigger size in 2019 and ignored the reviews about the gums being burnt thinking it wouldn't happen to ME. 😥 I'm going back to Closys sensitive mouthwash now. Lol. ☹️ In the trash you go. 2 stars. Wish the formula stayed the same. It really did whiten my teeth when I use to buy it before they changed things, good times. 😒
customer_reviews.author: Eco E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product that helps kill bad evil germs and whitens teeth!
customer_reviews.author: chris piccione

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT IS AWESOME!!
customer_reviews.text: THIS PRODUCT IS AWESOME!!! MAKES YOUR MOUTH FEEL SO FRESH!! I HAVE NOTICED MY TEETH ARE WHITER AND CLEANER!! JUST LOVE THIS PRODUCT!! BEST NEW ITEM I FOUND IN 2017!!
customer_reviews.author: VB..BDMAMA

customer_reviews.title: Unique and effective.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff legit. After a brush and then using this mouthwash, not only my teeth feel cleaner than ever before but also my entire mouth! It feels better than going to the dentist because everything just feels so naturally FRESH. I will say that it doesn’t taste very good. You can absolutely taste a strong peroxide taste which isn’t wonderful but the essential oils just didn’t do it for me either. If it were more minty, this product would be perfect. As it is, I’ll continue to buy it because it works SO well but I won’t enjoy using it as much I could if it tasted better.
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi Esmee

customer_reviews.title: I like it! Recommend Trying it.
customer_reviews.text: After Flossing and using Proxabrush, this mouth rinse sometimes finds some stuff that I missed between my teeth :) Super happy with results no mouth wash has worked better for me than this one so far. Taste doesn't bother me at all and sensation you get in your mouth doesn't bother me either.
customer_reviews.author: Tiger

customer_reviews.title: Awful Taste
customer_reviews.text: If I could, I would return this BR Rinse. For being organic, which I always try to use, it is the most awful tasting mouthwash I've ever used, Ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Louie Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Whiter teeth, mediocre taste.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff doesn’t taste life changing but it DOES gradual whiten your teeth without a ton of chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer because it works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this as a rinse before flossing for several months now and my last visit to the dentist I was told that the gum pockets have reduced. Will continue using
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Clean taste and it has a lot of good ingredients but I realize it's too harsh (hydrogen peroxide) after using it for a few weeks as it made my teeth more sensitive.
customer_reviews.author: Lamby bam

customer_reviews.title: So glad its back in stock
customer_reviews.text: This has been out of stock everywhere I was so glad to see it back in stock. We love that this is organic and not full of crap, as if we don't have enough to worry about today. We use it with the kids too. We also use it after we go outside to gargle with. I hope it stays back in stock for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Big fan!! Been using for almost a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Big fan!! Been using for almost a year and won't go back to regular toothpaste. My hygienist is always impressed.
customer_reviews.author: raobrick

customer_reviews.title: When your dentist says your teeth are white.
customer_reviews.text: I had been using this mouth rinse for several months. At my 6 month cleaning, my dentist said “look at those nice white teeth” while he was checking my teeth. ‘nough said.
customer_reviews.author: Celine Diane

customer_reviews.title: This stuff cleans my teeth like no other product I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff cleans my teeth like no other product I've ever used, plus no yucky aftertaste. I actually look forward to brushing my teeth now! It's too soon to tell whitening effects (2 weeks) but if I see a noticeable change I will report back. Even if I don't, this Brushing Rinse is still worth 5 stars!!
customer_reviews.author: ApplesOranges

customer_reviews.title: Non-Essential is More Like It
customer_reviews.text: This was ok. I just feel like after using it I leaves a filmy after taste but I guess if I am suppose to use this prior to brushing the taste will go away. I don't feel like my mouth and teeth is as white, fresh or clean as it adverises.
customer_reviews.author: Conny

customer_reviews.title: Poor flavor, does not freshen breath
customer_reviews.text: The taste of this mouthwash is not good, and it's so mild it does not feel like it has freshened your breath at all. I have to brush my teeth again after the mouthwash to get the taste of the mouthwash out of my mouth.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley B.

customer_reviews.title: I have been happy with how fresh my mouth feels
customer_reviews.text: I started using this about two months before my last dental cleaning, I have been happy with how fresh my mouth feels, and it has eliminated the sensitivity I usually had in a couple areas. The hygienist raved about how nice my teeth are, and said to keep doing whatever I'm doing. I felt that she did considerably less scraping than she normally does -- I am curious now to see if it's even better next time since I am using the product starting with freshly cleaned teeth. I feel confident giving it to my son, who just got braces, because of the natural and food-grade ingredients. I intend to keep using this.
customer_reviews.author: Mireille

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stuff.
customer_reviews.text: Love how clean this makes my teeth feel. Also don't wake up with morning breath.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Casper Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Fresh & Clean
customer_reviews.text: This product does not leave a sweet taste in my mouth. My whole mouth feels fresh and clean. I think my teeth are whiter as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sandie P

customer_reviews.title: Something has changed
customer_reviews.text: Used to love this product I have reordered it many times but, the last order was overpowering with a peroxide dominant taste. I can say I either received a bad bottle or they changed the recipe or manufacturer? Disappointed because this was my favorite product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debra S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Results
customer_reviews.text: When I first saw this product I was a little skeptical - I had never used a "brushing rinse" and wondered if it would actually work to get my teeth clean without a traditional paste. I was pleasantly surprised that not only does it provide a great clean for the whole mouth, I have always had a problem with excess tartar, particularly behind my lower front teeth, and this product is really helping keep this issue at bay between my cleanings. I have found nothing else like it, and I plan to continue using it. If I could give it more than five stars, I would!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Ive started to have problems with my guns bleedinf regardless of how frequently I brushed. This stuff after two days made them stop bleeding and honestly makes your mouth feel so clean. Im literally addicted to using this stuff because of how good your mouth feels after.
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It is great to rinse your mouth with when you first wake in the morning leaving your mouth fresh and healthy. The taste is pretty neutral. Gave a bottle to my elderly mother to use and she likes it, too, Due to heart issues, she can't have her teeth cleaned for a length of time so this was what I found as the answer to that.
customer_reviews.author: cm

customer_reviews.title: Has helped my gums heal
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I wish it wasn't as expensive as it is, but honestly I think it's worth it. I have super sensitive gums and since I started using this wash my over all sensitivity has gone down quite a bit. It's also helped to whiten my teeth in a gentle way (as opposed to strips) I usually use it once in the morning and then again at night. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Emma G

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: It is the 1.5% vs the 1% and I like this version so much better. I like the fact is has no fluoride or chemicals such as glycerin or carcinogens. My teeth feel clean and even look whiter. Will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Feather

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's not for everyone. Made my mouth very dry.
customer_reviews.author: Nauman Khan

customer_reviews.title: best organic brand!
customer_reviews.text: i love this stuff! i also use it with the tooth paste & the polish powder, i healed all my cavities & also healed a bad tooth that i thought i’d have go to the dentist for! my mouth has never been healthier than it is now using BR!!
customer_reviews.author: Jipsy

customer_reviews.title: So fresh so clean
customer_reviews.text: I'm obsessed with this rinse!! I stopped using toothpaste and I just use this to brush and as a mouthwash. I have severe recessed gums and need to get gum grafts but this has literally started raising my gum line. At first I thought I was crazy but i notice a large improvement. I still will probably need a graft but I'm hoping this helps!!
customer_reviews.author: Meagan

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: I highly dislike the flavor but it really works! I am a coffee drinker and my teeth are stained from it, but after a friend recommended this to me I noticed a great difference from when I first started using this to now!
customer_reviews.author: Jose Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Best Mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: I love this mouthwash. Itʻs so easy to use and doesnʻt burn the heck out of your mouth. I know itʻs good for me (you can see the ingredients right on the bottle), and it really does make my teeth whiter and freshen my breath. Iʻll continue buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleonahe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I don't like the feel of regular toothpaste in my mouth, nor do I want the fluoride that comes in it. So, I've used this product for years with good results. Put it in mouth, swish well, brush... Can add more and swish too. I use a waterpik and I get good results.
customer_reviews.author: Terrence Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Definitely my fave go to mouthwash. I'm a cigar ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely my fave go to mouthwash. I'm a cigar smoker so this rinse works wonders to maintain healthy fresh breath when partaking in not so healthy habits! does whiten as well.
customer_reviews.author: CharlyH

customer_reviews.title: Fresh breath and white teeth
customer_reviews.text: This mouth rinse is a bit pricey but it helps neutralize mouth odor and helps keep my teeth white. I also use the toothpaste. The flavor is mild and more tolerable than most mouthwashes and toothpaste. I do not get a nasty after taste after rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: You gotta buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! I tried the polish drops and the toothpaste, which were just okay, but this pre-brush rinse is fantastic! If I happen to get an infected gum (damned popcorn kernel), or a sore taste bud (who can wait for pizza cheese to cool?), this wash seems to really help heal my mouth. Additionally, my mouth feels cleaner and breath is fresher! Will buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: BabylonJane

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to rinse after!
customer_reviews.text: Hydrogen peroxide get some your mouth clean and fizzes! Just make sure to rinse your mouth after!
customer_reviews.author: Sydknee

customer_reviews.title: Taste was very "off."
customer_reviews.text: This tasted noticably different than the same product I buy off the shelf at Whole Foods. I won't purchase it on line again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Brueckman

customer_reviews.title: Useful!
customer_reviews.text: I like this. I also dip my tooth brush in baking soda. It absolutely a liquid so brushing with it can be quite tricky and it tastes odd. But I feel good it's cleaning the areas toothpaste cannot get to.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken McNugget

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly with all the reviews I wasn’t sure to buy it, some people said it doesn’t work and it’s bad others said it was good. 10/10 would recommend. Taste isn’t too bad and I can already see results in only a week!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great product with great ingredients!
customer_reviews.text: While it does taste...not great...it makes my mouth feel so fresh and clean! It has really great ingredients, so I can't knock the peroxide flavor. Great product overall!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kennell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: ONE Of my favorite products.. it works fabulous feels great too. This product is the only rinse/wash we use and have had great dental visit results.
customer_reviews.author: Estarovia

customer_reviews.title: Stain and germ fighting. Not full of yucky chemicals
customer_reviews.text: I like coffee and I feel like it helps with the stain. I also have battled gum disease and this seems to keep the germs at bay. It does foam a little. But was not bothersome to me.. Just so you know.
customer_reviews.author: Jet

customer_reviews.title: love this
customer_reviews.text: our 4 year old uses this, our 6 yr old didn't like it. we like it (the grown ups lol)... will continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: very positive
customer_reviews.text: Good flavor and taste of freshness on the palate. Has some hydrogen peroxide, as well as many other healthful herbal ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: nicola miller

customer_reviews.title: I seriously love this!  The ingredients are so natural and amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I seriously love this! It leaves my mouth feeling fresh and clean! I've also been doing a whiting toothpaste so my teeth have been getting whiter with the toothpaste and this mouth wash. My 3 year old daughter really likes this as well, she's swish her mouth in the mornings with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kaykay

customer_reviews.title: I Need More
customer_reviews.text: This mouthwash gets all of that nasty stuff out of your mouth in the morning. It removes plague from your tongue and teeth. It also gets rid of that thick nasty saliva that accumulates in the back of your throat. You only need about a tablespoon because it’s so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Emmm

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm loving this brushing rinse. It may not taste that good (and sort of makes a mess so lean over the sink!!) - but boy does it clean my teeth and breath! It foams up while brushing and leaves you with fresh breath, clean teeth and a knowledge you aren't putting "sugar" onto your teeth like so many toothpastes do! It's great to brush teeth or to just rinse after a meal. I'll keep using it!
customer_reviews.author: LBDDiaries

customer_reviews.title: My go-to mouthwash
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my teeth white and breath fresh while using natural ingredients. What more can I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Mranad

customer_reviews.title: Oxygen brushing rinse
customer_reviews.text: I was very sceptical at first but WOW this stuff is amazing. My mouth is cleaner then leaving the dentist office every day. Little to no taste very slight peroxide afterwards. You don't have a mouth overflowing with foam either. I have also notice that I have very little plaque in the morning when I use it at night. It is fantastic and I recommend everyone at least try it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri A. Agy

customer_reviews.title: Best stuff ever.
customer_reviews.text: This the best thing since sliced bread. I have MS and I don't have a lot of energy. This one thing you use to brush your teeth, freshen your breath and whiten your teeth in maybe about one minute.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New formula with extra peroxide
customer_reviews.text: This is a part of my daily oral care routine. Initially, I loved it, but they changed the formula and added more peroxide. Now it's a bit sour. I don't enjoy the taste anymore, but it does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley F.

customer_reviews.title: I Will continue to order this !!  For SURE !!
customer_reviews.text: I think I might give this out as Xmas presents this year! Yes, it's that good !! I told a few friends about it and have received emails thanking me for letting them know about it. If my tooth aches, I just use some of this ... or the Collidal Silver ... but better to use this as too much of the silver is like taking an antibiotic and then you need to replenish your probiotics, but not with this. It's a mouthwash and toothpaste 'all in one' !!! So worth the cost and it's also a preventative for gums etc !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mahima

This brushing rinse had made it a little easier.

Love it and I will always use it!

product_meta.title: Essential Oxygen Certified BR Organic Brushing Rinse, All Natural Mouthwash for Whiter Teeth, Fresher Breath, and Happier Gums, Alcohol-Free Oral Care, Peppermint, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Peppermint| Size:16 Ounce (Pack of 1)Essential Oxygen is a certified woman-owned triple bottom-line company that sees this planet and its people beaming with optimal health and promotes this vision by creating truly effective and clean natural products. Our Organic Brushing Rinse is the first step of The Pristine Protocol and your best smile ever. With the power of hydrogen peroxide and organic essential oils, this amazing pre-rinse works to naturally whiten teeth, freshen breath and clean your whole mouth, especially first thing in the morning.
feature_bullets: Contains 1-16 oz bottle of Organic Brushing Rinse Mouthwash (Packaging May Vary)

It Works! Premier Oral Care for whitening, breath freshening and removing bad breath germs with the power of hydrogen peroxide, aloe and organic essential oils. Learn more at YouTube: Essential Oxygen Brushing Rinse
It's Clean! Free of alcohol, fluoride, glycerin, sugars or sodium lauryl sulfate or Chlorine Bleach anything objectionable!
It's Planet Positive! Our oxygen-based formula makes grass greener and oceans cleaner.
Woman owned, NON GMO, vegan, gluten-free, BPA-free packaging, no animal testing and community giving.
